mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_ma_news WHERE type = #{type} AND STATUS != 3 LIMIT #{count}

SELECT news.id, news.create_time, lang.title, lang.content, lang.author FROM t_ma_news news LEFT JOIN t_ma_news_lang lang ON news.id = lang.new_id AND lang.lang = #{lang} WHERE type = #{type} AND STATUS = 2 ORDER BY news.create_time
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.id, n.create_time, n.status, n.type, nl.author, nl.content, nl.title FROM t_ma_news n LEFT JOIN t_ma_news_lang nl ON n.id = nl.new_id WHERE lang = #{lang} AND status != 4 ORDER BY n.create_time DESC
